q: EST WASHINGTON- If the memoir of Donald Rumsfeld , among the most powerful and controversial secretaries of defense, catches on with readers and critics, he could cite one of his many '' Donald Rumsfeld 's Rules'': The harder I work, the luckier I am. When Donald Rumsfeld began thinking about his book, ''Known and Unknown,'' he said he imagined a more typical Washington release: a quick, impressionistic story based on whatever he recalled. ''This is an administration that has spent a lot of the last two years suggesting that there's no relationship between capital formation and taxes,'' Mike Pence said. And so to hear the president acknowledge that one of the leading factors that are driving American jobs overseas is our extraordinarily high corporate tax rate was welcome indeed. Obviously, we'll look forward to work[ ing] with the administration on that. Watch the full interview here. Mike Pence , 51, announced Wednesday that he will not run for president in 2012. A number of leading politicians also expressed indignation, and ANSA news agency said talks were planned next week between Sergio Marchionne and Economic Development Minister Paolo Romani . In the next two or three years we will be able to see a single entity. It could be based here in the United States, Corriere della Sera quoted Sergio Marchionne as saying. The Defense Department guidance document made it clear that US military aims in regard to those states would go well beyond any ties to terrorism. The document said the Defense Department would also seek to isolate and weaken those states and to ''disrupt, damage or destroy their military capacities- not necessarily limited to weapons of mass destruction( WMD)...'' ''She is the vision of hope for this country right now,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said referring to Gabrielle Giffords . She embodies everything that Barack Obama was trying to say that we have to be better than we are, that we all have to conduct ourselves better than we do.
